text: Manuel Uribe Garza (11 June 1965 – 26 May 2014) was a Mexican man. He is known for suffering from morbid obesity. He was the world's fattest man. After reaching around and having been unable to leave his bed since 2001, Uribe lost about . It was one third of his body weight. He did this with the help of doctors and nutritionists. By the time of his death, Uribe was the world's third heaviest man. He was born in Monterrey, Nuevo León, Mexico. Uribe died at the age of 48 from liver failure in Monterrey, Nuevo León, Mexico. ==References== Category:1965 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from liver failure Category:Disease-related deaths in Mexico Category:Obesity Category:People from Monterrey Category:World record holders
title: Manuel Uribe
